thread.title: SOlid Hotel in a great location
thread.title_full: SOlid Hotel in a great location - Review of Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: MTM75
title: SOlid Hotel in a great location
text:
Hotel was clean and modern in a great area of the Latin Quarter on the left bank. Staff was very friendly and helpful. Walk to Notre Dame, Louvre, D'Orsay, and many other sites. Housekeeping was wonderful. Get a view of the Eiffel Tower on a high floor. Rooftop bar was closed as it was March and chilly, but we could access for the view.
Negative was no onsite parking, but you shouldn't need a car in the city anyway
Room Tip: Get an upper floor room with a balcony view of the Eiffel Tower. Ask for a room not adjacent to the... See more room tips
